title: Hi I have a pixel 2 and I want to add alt text to my photos to change the photos file name for SEO
content: Hi I had a Samsung before and I could change the photo file name by adding Alt text to the photo image . I can add a description but not the file name . I would really appreciate any help. Regards Paul for SEO purposes. I have been unable to find out how to do this on the pixel 2 phone . Any advice would be much appreciated.
